content: The capacity meter display flash drive makes it possible to see how much free space you have without having to plug it in. Compatible with both Macs and PCs, the drive features an always-on display at the front display the drive’s current storage capacity.

Shed some light on the Dark Side of your backyard by lighting up this Death Star firepit. This 36 inch diameter handmade masterpiece depicts the unfinished Death Star from Episode VI using 1/4 inch steel that creates an imposing sight when lit.

Improve the thickness and density of your lashes in mere weeks using this Spectral Lash eyelash stimulator. Designed for both men and women, this handy accessory helps promote hair growth for fuller lashes in about four weeks.

The EZ-Load toilet paper holder makes it remarkably simple to replace an empty roll of TP. Rather than having to struggle with a spring-loaded stick at the center, you simply pop in the new roll with a quick upward motion.

When there’s no power source in sight, the Omnicharge portable power station will save the day. Available in two sizes, this handy device is equipped to handle everything from smartphones and tablets, to cameras and even devices with a three-prong power cord.

Keep your open brew from going stale before you’re done drinking it by using one of these silicone bottle caps. These brightly colored flexible silicone caps are designed to fit most standard beer bottles and come in sets of six – a must-have for serious beer drinker.

Experience total comfort while you’re soaking up the rays by laying out on this pillowed beach towel. It comes with a removable contour pillow along with useful features like a water-resistant pocket and a touch screen pocket for your smartphone.

Become the loudest dressed individual at next year’s Burning Man by showing up in the fiber optic dress. At the press of a button this handmade garment will light up and dazzle everyone around with a technicolor show full of incredible hues and amazing effects.

Witness a stellar battle of good versus evil at the top of every hour with this Star Wars cuckoo clock. This stunning timepiece showcases Vader and Luke’s iconic fight – complete with illuminated lightsabers – as Emperor Palpatine watches from the sidelines.

titleEN: Gourmet PB&J Of The Month Club
content: What better gift for the foodie who has it all than a subscription to this gourmet PB&J of the month club? Each month, this one-of-a-kind club delivers finger-licking sandwiches filled with gourmet peanut butter and jellies from specialized boutiques from around the globe.

titleEN: Better TV Viewing Angle Beer Mug
content: Don’t miss a second of the action when you chug your brew by drinking out of this better TV viewing angle beer mug. This plastic mug holds approximately 1 pint and has a sloped edge that won’t block your field of vision while you drink.

This camping cube tent transforms your breezy canopy into a cozy shelter in mere seconds. This 10′ x 10′ shelter latches onto an existing canopy and comes with a large entry door with a screen to keep out bugs, 3 pockets for power cords, and even a doggy door.

Give your taste buds a swift kick in the ass the next time you eat by adding some TABASCO Scorpion Sauce to the mix. This tangy sauce delivers a potent flavor twenty times hotter than the original TABASCO sauce, and finishes off with a touch of sweetness.

Cook any campfire meal to perfection using this multi-tool attachment roasting stick. The practical design lets you switch between various attachments so that you can cook anything from hamburgers to marshmallows to hotdogs.

Make your feline friend the happiest cat on the block by keeping him entertained with this cat activity play mat. This Disneyland for cats measures 35 x 47 inches and comes with a removable mat filled with differently sized holes that your kitty can crawl in and out of.

Give your outdoor area a little personality by accenting it using these whimsical solar powered mushroom garden lights. Standing just over a foot tall, these handmade glass mushrooms charge during the day and will glow in a symphony of colors by night.

Ensure a steady supply of food in the event society collapses by growing your own crops using the emergency survival seed pack. Encased inside the 15 year shelf life waterproof Mylar bag are thousands of seeds to provide you with a healthy diet year round.

Solve your fly problem once and for all with the BUG-A-SALT 2.0. This new and improved model uses less salt and offers MORE POWER, holding up to 80 rounds so that you can annihilate every pesky house fly in one murderous evening.

Watch people make complete asses of themselves with help from these motion and voice activated prank stickers. Just place them right onto any water fountain, hand dryer, or paper towel disposer and let the show begin.

Turn the dead of night into the middle of the afternoon by turning on the world’s brightest flashlight. Made with a super tough military-grade aluminum frame, it is capable of producing an astounding 4100 lumens of intense white light.

Help your clothes and linens stay smelling fresh while you’re not using them by hanging up the closet air purifier. This compact device employs advanced plasma breeze ionic technology to freshen the air and eliminate musty odors.

Get unmatched quality no matter what format you shoot by capturing it using the Canon 4K ultra high definition camcorder. It’s capable of capturing 305Mbps 4K video equally as well as still images – making it a must-have for any serious photographer.

titleEN: Eat A D*ck Coexist Parody Bumper Sticker
content: Piss off nearly every driver on the road faster than your car can go from 0-60 by expressing your disdain for mankind with the “eat a d*ck” coexist parody bumper sticker. The crass message is cleverly written using only the symbols of the world’s leading religions.

Make it rain on your opponent by dousing them with an endless barrage of projectiles using the NERF Rival Nemesis MXVII-10K blaster. This fully motorized weapon features quick-firing action and comes with an easy-loading hopper that holds up to 100 rounds.

Keep any door completely secure by locking it with this super strong portable door lock. As thin as an envelope, this compact lock can be easily installed or removed in mere seconds – making it a must-have security and privacy tool while traveling.

titleEN: Cookie Shot Glass Making Pan Set
content: Take your snacking to the next level by improving a classic with this cookie shot glass making pan set. This nonstick dishwasher safe pan comes with six cylindrical cavities that let you create perfectly shaped cookie shot glasses that are ideal for filling with milk.

Get answers to life’s biggest questions with a little sass by asking the almighty sarcastic magic 8-ball. Upon asking it your burning questions, the all-knowing 8-ball will reply with a variety of hilarious quips like “ask me if I care” or “in your dreams”.

Turn pasta night into a religious experience by using this Flying Spaghetti Monster colander to drain your noodles. This vibrant colander transforms into the noble deity whenever you fill the bowl up with fresh spaghetti – making it ideal for any practicing Pastafarian.

The modular power outlet surge protector’s functional design conforms exactly to your needs. This surge protector’s ingenious design features detachable modules that let you connect a wide range of outlets for everything from AC extension sockets to USB chargers.

Stimulate your scientific interest by expanding your knowledge base with the Albert Einstein personal genius robot. He comes with built-in Wi-Fi, can chat with you, teach you science, manage your calendar, and can make over 50 life-like gestures.

Bring a carnival favorite to a kitchen near you by making some delicious snacks with this caramel apple topping station. It features a 16 ounce melting pot at the center that’s perfect for your caramel or chocolate and comes with 6 topping trays and 4 decorating trays that spin.

Now you can literally give a shit and/or a flying fuck with these Zero Fucks coins! Available in a variety of designs, there’s no better way to display how little you care than by flicking one of these insulting coins at someone.

Give your next work of art incredible color and texture by creating it using the Faber Castle watercolor pencil set. Whether you use them dry or with water, this set of 120 premium color pencils gives your work a soft and dynamic color laydown.

Keep your mobile device running in case of a power outage with nothing more than this emergency candle phone charger. Using just a candle and a little water, you’ll be able to safely and reliably charge your smartphone.

titleEN: Rick And Morty Anatomy Park Game
content: Design the ultimate theme park inside Ruben – the homeless department store Santa – by playing the Rick and Morty Anatomy Park game. You and your fellow players will be designing the park and shifting internal organs around to suit your needs before time expires.

Forget about harmful pesticides – now you can protect your garden with these praying mantis eggs. The eggs allow you to grow your own live praying mantises so you can let them loose in your garden to help control and eliminate garden destroying insects.

Revolutionize the way you explore the underwater world when you venture out with the easy breathing snorkel mask. The mask’s innovative full face design allows the snorkeler to breathe naturally through the nose and provides an unobstructed 180 degree view.

As strange as it sounds, we will never be able to see our actual reflection, unless we’re in possession of the true reflection mirror. The only kind in the word, the mirror shows things as they actually are without reversing the left and right sides.

Avoid making a mess in the kitchen the next time you prepare some waffles by making them on the perfect pour waffle maker. It features an innovative anti-leaking system that seals in the batter while it’s cooking so it never spills over while it’s in its gooey state.

Relive Kevin McCallister’s unforgettable adventure by bringing it to life coloring the pages of the Home Alone coloring book. Each page depicts a memorable scene from the beloved 90s movie – like when he splashes some aftershave on his face.

One-up the Mother of Dragons by placing these incredible color changing magical dragon eggs on display. The scales on these handcrafted 4-inch eggs begin to change color right before your very eyes when reacting to the heat coming off your body.

This insane smartphone controlled Batmobile is as close as you’ll ever get to driving the real thing. This 1/10th scale ride makes authentic sounds, features controllable weapons, smoke release from the exhaust, and a driver’s POV camera in the cockpit.

The Breville smart oven is your ticket to enjoying delicious home-cooked meals on a nightly basis. Whether it’s cooking, baking, dehydrating, or air-frying, this oven features 13 helpful preset functions designed to deliver precise cooking temps for perfect results.

Go on a globe-trotting safari without leaving your couch by looking through the pages of The Photo Ark. This visually captivating read depicts photographer Joe Sartore’s lifelong project to capture portraits of all the world’s animals – especially those that are endangered.

Ditch the overcrowded classes and become a skilled yogi from the comfort of home using the yoga learning mat. This natural rubber mat comes with a ten-session DVD and numbered circles printed onto the surface of the mat that show proper hand and foot placement.

Give your whip a futuristic appearance with this car interior lighting kit. The kit includes four specially designed ultra bright LEDs that light up to give your car’s interior an out of this world neon blue glow that is bound to turn heads wherever you drive.

Kick up the fun factor during your next outdoor excursion by sneaking in a drink or four inside the hidden liquor flask ice pack. This seemingly inconspicuous ice pack is actually a stealthy and leak-proof 14 ounce BPA plastic flask that won’t alter the taste of your beverage one bit.

Immortalize special moments and treasured memories that you never want to forget by writing them down in the My Life Story diary. This journal comes with 1,080 blank pages that are ready to be filled with random thoughts, important events, and pictures that highlight your life.

It looks like the Cheeto-In-Chief’s incessant verbal diarrhea is actually good for something – cleaning up your shit. Apart from doing a bang-up job at wiping away your messes, this Donald Trump tweets toilet paper makes soul crushing bathroom reading material.

Sleep like a baby during long flights by bringing along the world’s best travel pillow. It sports a soft, cuddly exterior and can be used in one of five different positions so that you can comfortably rest on airplane seats or any flat surface, like your office desk.

Feel like you’re lathering up with ultra soft flowers by using this Japanese rose shaped soap dispenser. It comes filled with soap made from natural botanicals and soothing flowers that is dispensed in the form of small white foamy blooming roses.

The Awkward Moments Children’s Bible is the hilarious adult themed read designed to get you thinking critically about the good book. It combines a series of actual bible verses and whimsical illustrations to get readers thinking about how the Bible shapes our culture.

Say goodbye to night sweats forever once you begin sleeping with the bed climate control machine. This life changing machine installs on any size bed in minutes and allows you to control the exact temperature using a free app on your smartphone.

Turn heads when you’re tearing up the streets at night by outfitting your board with these skate deck underglow LED lights. These compact battery operated lights come with an adhesive backing that makes them remarkably easy to stick onto your board.

Give your compact Raspberry Pi a cool retro feel with this NES case. Designed for Raspberry Pi 3, 2 and B+, this compact plastic casing features a classic Nintendo-inspired design that gives you full access to all ports and SD slots.

Put on an impromptu magic show anywhere you go by pulling out this flaming wallet magic trick. The wallet comes fitted with a discreet fire cloth that instantly burns for a few seconds when you open your wallet and extinguishes when you close it back up.

Make life easier for your thirsty guests during your next nighttime shindig by making your drinks more noticeable using these LED cooler lights. These battery powered lights are waterproof and come in 6 bight colors – blue, gold, orange, white, red, and green.

Feel safe while you’re out and about by having this discreet personal safety device on you. Apart from serving as a panic button, it lets you send your contacts update texts that display your location and whether you’re feeling safe, uneasy, or are in an emergency.

Grant your furry friend easy access in and out of the house – without having to worry about unwanted critters sneaking in – by installing the microchip pet door. It scans your pet’s microchip or RFID collar tag and can be programmed to lock at any time you set.

Blast through your anus with reckless abandon as you condiment everything you eat with the colon cleaner hot sauce. With its assortment of fiendishly spicy ingredients, virtually no adventurous eater will be able to resist flooding their meals with this spicy hot sauce.

Obliterate your opponents during your next battle royal by arming yourself with the NERF modulus tri-strike blaster. This imposing blaster is designed to fire three different types of ammunition – including massive mega darts using the built-in missile launcher.

Feel like a little kid all over again by reliving your glorious trike days on this adult big wheel tricycle. This over-sized trike boasts a comfortable chair and sturdy frame so that you can ride hard without accidentally loosing your balance and falling over.

Get kinky come snack time by sinking your teeth into a delicious white Belgian chocolate edible anus. Each delectable little anus is made from pure Belgian chocolate that will flood your senses and mouth with its unmatched taste and rich creaminess.

Break your phone addiction once and for all by carrying around the brain reconditioning NoPhone fake smartphone. It has the look, feel, and weight of a regular iPhone without the distracting features like a camera or social media – there’s not even a functional screen!

Keep your canine’s sense of smell as sharp as ever by serving your pooch’s snacks or food on this foraging and feeding mat. This machine-washable mat mimics the hunt for food in nature, putting your doggy’s nose and brain to work by encouraging natural foraging skills.

Achieve snack-time nirvana – even if you’re not near the kitchen – by digging into a Nutella snack and drink combo. One compartment comes filled with creamy Nutella, the other with bread sticks for dipping, and the third with a tasty beverage to wash it all down.

Give your buddy’s b-day celebration a little Las Vegas flair with this flashing happy birthday cake topper. This reusable cake topper comes embedded with LEDs that flash in a sequence – at the push of button – to give your already delicious cake some added curbside appeal.

Enjoy the unrivaled taste of charred meat without filling your home with a cloud of smoke by using this portable smokeless charcoal electric grill. It features an ingenious double grill pan system that reduces up to 90% of smoke while you grill.

Look like a fearless Rebel Alliance pilot when you’re zooming down the highway on your bike by protecting your noggin with this X-Wing pilot motorcycle helmet. It boasts an advanced polycarbonate shell for superior protection and comes with an integrated sun shield.

Give your favorite card game a magical twist by sitting down for a rousing game of Cards Against Harry Potter. This download comes with five PDF files that contain everything you’ll need to make your own deck – complete with 387 black cards and 1,071 white cards.

Greet the new day in a better mood by waking up naturally using the sunrise simulating alarm clock. It emits soothing natural sounds, can light up in 1 of 7 colors, and gradually increases the brightness from 1 to 100 so that you wake up in a more natural way.

Start living healthier by cutting out the sugary drinks and drinking more water using this brain tricking fruit flavored cup. The ingenious design gives the cup a fruity aroma and sweet taste – thereby fooling your brain into thinking it’s drinking delicious fruit juice.

Give Houdini a run for his money by becoming a master lock pick by honing your skills on this transparent practice padlock. The transparent design allows you to see exactly how the lock works so that you can more easily pick it open.

Bring unparalleled beauty in addition to an awesome tripiness factor to any indoor landscape using these light up mushroom lamps. These solar powered lamps provide an energy efficient way to bring a subtle hint of nature into any drab and cold urban landscape.

WARNING! Ingesting the contents of this water bottle may lead to severe incidents of diaphoresis, micturition, and acute tissue hydration. For any inferior non-scientific minds out there, this means that it may cause sweating, peeing, and provide adequate hydration.

Keep your cash and ID safe from the outside world by placing them in the RFID blocking carbon fiber wallet. The introduction of CF-Lex technology allows carbon fiber to be bent and reformed into this sleek and ultra durable wallet that is three times stronger than steel.

Give your dull yard a fun carnival feel using this backyard mini gold set. The set comes with a series of brightly colored plastic pieces that you can place anywhere in order to create an impromptu mini golf court where you can practice and perfect your putting.

Turn lunchtime into a full blown spectacle for everyone at the table by serving your tasty meal on this tabletop sushi Ferris wheel. This battery-powered Ferris wheel spins your delicious sushi rolls round and round until you engage the lever and your sushi rolls down the ramp.

Kiss the days of having to control your flatulence goodbye by using one of these fart gas neutralizing pads. They adhere discreetly to clothing and contain antimicrobial activated charcoal technology that kill the stench before innocent bystanders suffer.

Connecting USB 3.0 flash drives, microSD and SD memory cards to your USB Type-C port smartphone is simpler than ever with this USB-C smartphone connection kit. This compact accessory comes with integrated USB, SD, and micro SD slots.

Don’t worry if mom and dad give you the boot because Almost Adulting has you covered. This informative read features a series of captivating lists, essays, and artwork that cover everything from making friends online to assembling a somewhat acceptable wardrobe.

Avoid feeling like death after a night of hitting the sauce by hydrating yourself with this hangover prevention drink formula. Drinking just one or two bottles before the night starts is enough to help your body recover quickly and successfully bounce back the next morning.

titleEN: Light Up Battery Pack Makeup Mirror
content: This light up battery pack makeup mirror is the little accessory no purse should be without. Apart from two compact mirrors that are lit by LED strips, it comes with an integrated 3,000 mAh battery and USB port so that you can charge your phone while you’re on-the-go.

Beat the heat by treating yourself to a delicious homemade snow cone using this shaved ice snow cone machine. It features a transparent 360 chamber that lets you see as the cone is being made and comes with stainless steel blades that shave the ice just right.

Avoid becoming roadkill as you ride through the streets by outfitting your bicycle with this rear view radar. This revolutionary device wirelessly integrates with compatible Edge cycling computers and warns you of approaching cars from up to 150 yards.

Add a whimsical touch to your magical pool day by lounging around on this unicorn pool float. This 45 inch wide tube is made from premium vinyl raft material that’s 25% thicker than traditional floats and comes with a rapid-inflate valve for quick inflation.

Stay fit while slaving away at your soul crushing office job by replacing your workstation with the treadmill desk. This customized desk fits almost any treadmill and provides ample space to work comfortably so that you can stay productive as you get your daily cardio in.

Experience the reinvention of the wheel by equipping your board with these square skateboard wheels. The hybrid shape of the wheels is designed to give you unheard of control over rugged and/or wet terrain while displaying a logic defying cubed shape as they roll.

No emergency car kit should be without the compact trucker multi-tool. This must-have tool is not only remarkably durable, but comes packed with fourteen useful tools such as a glass breaker and a hatchet blade so that you’re ready for anything.

Effortlessly increase your vert during your next game by playing it on this inflatable basketball court. This bouncy court measures 336″ x 144″ x 90″ and comes equipped with an air pump that inflates the court in less than two minutes.

Give your workstation a multicolored makeover by incorporating the rainbow backlit keyboard into the mix. This technicolor component features a sturdy space bar designed for gaming and comes equipped with laser carved keys that light up in a bevy of colors.

Keep a drawer’s worth of useful tools on you at all times by latching the B.A.T. coin 10-in-1 multi-tool to your keychain. This quarter-sized TSA compliant tool comes packed with everything from wire strippers and a friction saw to a flat head screwdriver and bottle opener.

Convert your lame human foot prints into some cool animal foot prints with these unique sandals. These animal footprint sandals are a great gift for kids who love animals – but also can be quite useful for criminals looking to evade trackers.

Give yourself a little extra room in the shower without needing to perform costly renovations by installing this curved shower curtain. Designed to fit 99% of all showers, the clever curved design of the rod adds up to 25% extra room in the shower.

Keeping your microwave looking like new is easier and more fun that ever with the erupting volcano microwave cleaner. Simply fill the small volcano with water and vinegar, microwave for 5-8 minutes, and use a sponge or rag to wipe off all the grime in one fluid motion.

Become the envy of all your sci-fi crazed pals by placing this 1/20 magnetic floating DeLorean time machine on display. Doc Brown’s iconic time travelling DeLorean is meticulously recreated with high attention to detail that includes 10 light-up features for maximum authenticity.

Deal your day old diet a fatal blow as you indulge in the giant Reese’s peanut butter cups. Each monstrous piece contains eight ounces of chocolaty peanut butter goodness guaranteed to satisfy even the biggest cravings.

Keep your ensemble looking pristine as you slave over a hot stove with the stainproof chef’s jacket. This long lasting garment is made using a specialized hydrophobic nanotechnology designed to repel water and stains so it can stay cleaner for longer.

Bring some color into the room with a little style using these reversible sequin pillows. Each pillow features a dual colored all-sequin exterior that you can switch from one color to another with an effortless stroke of your hand along its surface.

Get a revitalizing dose of energy without filling your body with copious amounts of sugar by gulping down one of these Bizzy coffee shots. Small enough to fit in your pocket, this 0 calorie, sugar-free drink contains between 130-150mg of naturally occurring caffeine.
